function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low medical-knowledge levels in early hospitals","Impact":"Increased risk of misdiagnosis and improper treatment","Mitigation":"Improving medical training and standards","Technologies":"Advanced medical education and training programs","People":"Patients, medical practitioners","Owner":"Medical institutions, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of disease identification and treatment","Impact":"Inadequate care and treatment for diseases","Mitigation":"Enhancing medical knowledge and training","Technologies":"Medical research and education programs","People":"Patients, medical practitioners","Owner":"Medical institutions, research institutions"},{"Description":"Contagious diseases spreading in early health facility designs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing infection control measures, improving facility design","Technologies":"Infection control technologies, architectural design strategies","People":"Patients, medical practitioners, caretakers","Owner":"Medical institutions, architectural firms"}]}
